name: magento-e2e-cypress
description: This repository contains an end-to-end Cypress automation project for the Magento demo e-commerce site: [https://magento.softwaretestingboard.com](https://magento.softwaretestingboard.com).

scripts.report:merge: mochawesome-merge reports/mochawesome/*.json > reports/mochawesome/merged.json && marge reports/mochawesome/merged.json -f report -o reports/mochawesome/html
scripts.test: npm run cy:run && npm run report:merge
